name: L.A. Social Karma
tagline: Los Angeles Social Media Management Company
description:
LA Social Karma is a Boutique Marketing Firm that focuses on helping locally owned businesses manage their online presence.
This includes Facebook Instagram, Pinterest, Google +, Yelp, and Trip Advisor.
We provide one-on-one consulting or absolute end-to-end management of the different social sites. This includes generating monthly content, daily monitoring of sites, and consulting on whatâ€™s new in the ever-changing social media landscape.
